name: flogo-aws-sms
title: Send SMS via AWS SNS
description: Send SMS message via AWS SNS

settings.name: region
settings.description: The AWS region to use (note: SMS is not supported in all AWS regions)

settings.name: smsType
settings.description: The type of SMS to send, defaults to Promotional

settings.name: senderID
settings.description: The Sender ID for the SMS (note: not supported in all countries)

settings.name: maxPrice
settings.description: The maximum amount in USD that you are willing to spend to send a message

input.name: to
input.description: The phone number to which to send the SMS (e.g. +15555550100 )
